title: Easily Extract Data from StatsWales
text: statswalesr package downloading datasets associated metadata StatsWales. functionality limited datasets available OData feed. can check navigating desired dataset, scrolling bottom, checking “Dataset” link available Open Data tab. documentation site generated pkgdown can found link.

title: Easily Extract Data from StatsWales
text: statswalesr now CRAN. install: can install development version statswalesr GitHub :

title: Easily Extract Data from StatsWales
text: code extracts data aircraft movement Cardiff airport associated metadata. can also search datasets based key terms. example, search datasets related farming agriculture:
code: library(statswalesr)  metadata <- statswales_get_metadata("tran0003")  df <- statswales_get_dataset("tran0003") library(dplyr)  farming_datasets <- statswales_search(c("farm*", "agri*"))  glimpse(farming_datasets) ## Rows: 29 ## Columns: 2 ## $ Description_ENG <chr> "Children's services: Welfare/health summary", "Childr… ## $ Dataset         <chr> "care0021", "care0022", "agri0200", "agri0201", "agri0…

title: Easily Extract Data from StatsWales
text: statswalesr functions support Welsh language downloads using language argument: Hex sticker Lew Furber.

what: Retrieves a dataset from the StatsWales — statswales_get_dataset
title: Retrieves a dataset from the StatsWales — statswales_get_dataset
text: statswales_get_dataset returns dataframe StatsWales using dataset id. print_progress argument can set TRUE keep track progress extracting large dataset.

title: Retrieves a dataset from the StatsWales — statswales_get_dataset
Retrieves a dataset from the StatsWales — statswales_get_dataset
text: id dataset id. Must single string.

title: Retrieves a dataset from the StatsWales — statswales_get_dataset
text: dataset id valid, function return requested dataset dataframe. id valid, function return NULL.

title: Retrieves a dataset from the StatsWales — statswales_get_dataset
code: data <- statswales_get_dataset("LGFS0021") #> Rows: 9617 Columns: 20 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: "," #> chr (11): Row_ItemName_ENG_STR, Row_ItemName_WEL_STR, Row_ItemNotes_ENG_STR,... #> dbl  (9): Data_DEC, Row_Code_DEC, Row_SortOrder_DEC, Row_Hierarchy_DEC, Auth... #>  #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. #> Dataset extracted successfully with 9617 rows and 20 columns.

title: Retrieve metadata of a dataset from StatsWales — statswales_get_metadata
Retrieve metadata of a dataset from StatsWales — statswales_get_metadata
text: id dataset id string language string. Returns metadata either English ('english') Welsh ('welsh'). default English.

title: Retrieve metadata of a dataset from StatsWales — statswales_get_metadata
text: dataset id valid, output requested metadata dataframe. id valid, function return HTTP error.

title: Retrieve metadata of a dataset from StatsWales — statswales_get_metadata
text: statswales_get_metadata returns dataframe containing metadata StatsWales using dataset id.

title: Retrieve metadata of a dataset from StatsWales — statswales_get_metadata
code: metadata <- statswales_get_metadata("hlth0515") #> Warning: `statswales_get_metadata()` was deprecated in statswalesr 0.3.0.

title: Search StatsWales datasets — statswales_search
text: function deprecated StatsWales ended OData service August 2024.

title: Search StatsWales datasets — statswales_search
text: search_text vector search terms. language string. Returns metadata either English ('english') Welsh ('welsh'). default English.

title: Search StatsWales datasets — statswales_search
text: dataframe StatsWales dataset titles IDs.

title: Search StatsWales datasets — statswales_search
text: statswales_search returns dataframe dataset titles IDs StatsWales, based user's text input.

what: statswalesr: Easily Extract Data from 'StatsWales' — statswalesr-package
title: statswalesr: Easily Extract Data from 'StatsWales' — statswalesr-package
text: Download data 'StatsWales' R. Removes need user write loops parsing data 'StatsWales' API. Provides functions datasets (http://open.statswales.gov.wales/en-gb/dataset) metadata (http://open.statswales.gov.wales/en-gb/discover/metadata) endpoints.

title: statswalesr: Easily Extract Data from 'StatsWales' — statswalesr-package
text: Maintainer: Jamie Ralph jamesryanralph@outlook.com
